full_summary:
Tender Invitation
=====================

 Tender Title
 -------------

### English
E6MON-24PQBO P02 - RMSO Bakery Products

### French
E6MON-24PQBO P02 - OCPR Produits de Boulangerie

Reference Information
--------------------

*Reference Number: WS4431900429*
*Doc Number: 4453698652*
*Amendment Number: 1*
*Solicitation Number: WS4431900429*

Notice Details
-------------

* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (Demande d'offre à commandes)
* **Publication Date:** June 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 09, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** June 13, 2024

 Procurement Information
----------------------

* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and others (see trade agreements list)
* **Sourcing Region:** Quebec (except NCR)
* **Products Category:** [50180000] - Bread and bakery products
* **Commodity:** Bakery products

Instructions to Tenderers
------------------------

The tenderer must provide a statement of availability and a copy of their certificate of registration in the Commercial Register (Registre des entreprises du Canada) at the time of submission.

Tendering Method
----------------

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding (Méthode d'approvisionnement: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Criteria for Evaluation:** Lowest Price

Procurement Entity
----------------

* **Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada, K1A 0S5
* **Phone:** None
* **Fax:** None
* **Email:** selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Please find additional details in the official notice available **[here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20000770?extsite=MjAwMDA3NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)**.  Click on the link to access the official notice. For more information, please contact Ly, Selina.
